match: ([a, b, c], env, stack) => evaluate(a, env, stack).match(new RegExp(evaluate(b, env, stack), evaluate(c, env, stack)))
split: ([a, b, c], env, stack) => evaluate(a, env, stack).split(new RegExp(evaluate(b, env, stack), evaluate(c, env, stack)))
replace: ([a, b, c, d], env, stack) => evaluate(a, env, stack).replace(new RegExp(evaluate(b, env, stack), evaluate(c, env, stack)), evaluate(d, env, stack))
search: ([a, b, c], env, stack) => evaluate(a, env, stack).search(new RegExp(evaluate(b, env, stack), evaluate(c, env, stack)))
